text: Gert Arne Blomé (28 August 1934 – 27 January 2021) was a Swedish ice hockey player. He competed at the 1960 and 1964 Winter Olympics. He won a silver medal in 1964. Blomé was born in Gävle, Sweden. Blomé died on 27 January 2021 in Gothenburg, Sweden at the age of 86.Frölundas guldhjälte Gert Blomé, 86, död ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Swedish ice hockey defencemen Category:Olympic silver medalists for Sweden
title: Gert Blomé
